General.Name: Quaser Machine Tools
General.Description: Quaser Machine Tools, Inc. manufactures and sells machine tools in Europe, Asia, North America, South America, Africa, and Oceania. It offers vertical, 5-axis mill-turn, pallet, horizontal, and multi face 5 axes M/C machine tools, as well as FMC series products. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Taichung City, Taiwan.
